Text2: 1st Floor 1 Bed? Yes Please!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome home, you have arrived! We are proud to introduce Tiburon Ridge. This gorgeous BRAND-NEW property located right off of 180th and 370, provides an upscale living experience unlike any other in the area. 
 
Exquisite designs, paired with an ideal location, make our community a top choice for Southwest Omaha and Gretna. Offering one-, two-, or three-bedroom apartment homes, we are sure that you'll find the perfect floor plan for your needs. Offering a rural escape while being minutes from dining, shopping, and entertainment. Tiburon Ridge is located in the Gretna School District with direct access to Highway 370 and I-80, creating a convenient corridor ranging from both downtown Omaha to Lincoln, ensuring you will be at the center of it all. Enjoy a day at Mahoney State Park and dinner in Dundee or a morning of hitting the rinks followed by an afternoon Cornhusker Football game; the possibilities are endless. 
 
Varied floor plan layouts offer unique options including balconies, patios, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, and flex workspace. Well-appointed community space and outdoor amenity options provide a living experience that will not disappoint. Amenities will include a clubhouse, leasing office, outdoor pool, fire pit, fitness center, dog parks, secure package locker system, and storm shelter! 
 
From custom home-like finishes featuring two unique kitchen aesthetics ranging from white to dark scale and wood-inspired flooring, you will be proud to entertain or enjoy a serene sunset on your private balcony. Our apartments have it all! Come live where peacefulness meets convenience and where living meets extraordinary. Tiburon Ridge provides more than an apartment; it is a lifestyle experience. Explore our photo gallery and see for yourself why we're the best fit for you and your lifestyle. To get the full experience, please schedule a visit to our property! 
 
Please call us TODAY and set up a tour of your new home at Tiburon Ridge! 
 
*Prices, specials and availability subject to change at any time* 
 
https://www.tiburonridge.com/ 
 
Equal Opportunity Housing 
Professionally managed by Lund Company

Text2: $200 off the first months rent if leased by 11/23/2022
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
3 Bedroom, Single-story Townhomes for rent in Winterset, IA

Did you know you could lease a ranch style townhome for about the same cost as renting an apartment? The conveniences of an apartment with the enjoyment of your own front door, yard and attached garage. Upgrade your apartment experience to townhome living with Kading!

We offer affordable living with desired amenities such as washer/dryer hook-ups, cable ready units, air conditioning, ceramic tile flooring in all common areas and carpeted bedrooms & living rooms. Open concept floor plans provide ultimate flexibility to decorate your personal space and make it your own. Let your kids enjoy a space to play – whether your little humans or your little fur babies. Lawn care, snow management, pet stations, and 24-hour emergency maintenance are provided. We take on the upkeep so you can take back your time!

Enjoy the seasons in Madison County! The irresistible historic town square, the local wineries & eateries, and the six famous covered bridges amidst the rolling emerald hills provide a veritable feast for the senses throughout all four seasons! As the county seat of Madison County, Winterset houses a dazzling French Renaissance Revival-style courthouse as its centerpiece, surrounded by modern commercial businesses to serve your needs while preserving the local heritage and Italianate buildings’ charm.

Glenwood by Kading is conveniently located just two blocks from Highway 169/92 with easy access to downtown Winterset, or to Interstates 35 or 80 if you’re venturing out of town. Though, we’re not sure why you would want to leave! The sense of community pride, friendliness of local shopkeepers, strong schools, and surrounding natural landscape provide that calming, stress-free, small town life; yet only 35 minutes away from all the benefits of the Des Moines metro area!

Kading builds with you in mind. We understand your need for affordable independence. Our team works hard to provide a genuine community feel - a safe haven in a convenient location.

We are dedicated to supporting our residents through superior care and responsiveness to your needs. We offer an online tenant portal making it easy to communicate with us to sign or renew your lease, make timely payments, and place service requests all from the convenience of your laptop, tablet, or smartphone.

We hope you choose to make our house your home!

I am a kid/animal lover. :) I am open to helping out in exchange for reduced rent or reasonable rent. https://dallas.craigslist.org/ftw/sha/.html#:~:text=HelloHello :) I'm looking for a room for me and my mom until the end of the month - I'm a proofreader and my mom is a retired teacher .... I can pay you $200 . Thank you so much for your interest ! Have a great day :) Hi guys. I’m a gay . I’m a full time student. My housing budget was significantly reduced and need a place to live while I finish school. Lost my job as a framer when I was bit by a dog two weeks ago. Since then I've tried to find as much side work as I can but competition is fierce out here. If you have any sort of work that needs to be done or think you might be able to help us in any way please call or text me at . I'm a framer by trade but I also do all sorts of remodeling. Tile work, flooring ,grout, just about anything. Today's my last day before they throw me out on the street. It's too cold and I've never been in a situation like this. Please help my family and my self.I'm a 52-year-old man looking for a room for rent in Denton starting at the first of December. I've been in Jamestown, North Dakota for the last 3 months, and am planning to move back to Denton, where I've lived off and on since 1996. I'm drug-free and have an absolutely clean criminal background. I have a rock-solid monthly income from Social Security, and I also will be working a part-time job. Plus, I have a healthy bank balance. I'm currently working on a book project and spend my days out and about. Generally, I'm out the door no later than 8:00am and don't come back till after 5:00p, which means I wouldn't be hanging around inside all day running up your utility bill. Libraries and coffee houses are where I generally hang out doing research for my book. I am a cigarette smoker but will not smoke on your property. I drink a couple of beers in the evening but nothing excessive. I can provide great rental references and have always paid the rent on time. One thing: I'm very quiet and considerate, and expect the same in return, so if you're into blaring a TV or stereo that comes through the walls, hey, that's just not for me. Ditto a barking dog at night. So if you've got an extra room you're looking to make some money from, please feel free to contact me via the CraigsList email relay to start out.I'm posting this to see if someone can help us. My friend and I need a 2 bedroom apartment or house. Are budget is around $1000.00 a month. We both work and would be nice to have something for December. We're we are at now there evicting the person we're renting from. So we're kinda forced to move. We're looking for something in the old east Dallas area. in search of one-year lease in Keller, NRH, Watauga, East Fort Worth area. Wanting a furnished bedroom and private bath with utilities included (including WIFI). I will be moving out of state in approximately one year so looking for something temporary until then. I do not smoke. I work full time, of course. I'm quiet, clean, organized. I pay my rent on time, every time. I don't need to be entertained and spend my off-work hours reading, shopping or simply resting. I'm not looking for a relationship and I'm not a housekeeper or caregiver. I love pets of all kinds but have none of my own currently. If you could use some extra income and have an unused bedroom/bath, I'd love to hear from you! I can pay $600 monthly. Thanks for reading! Needing to Move out ASAP from rent house. Looking for serious inquires to take over the lease. Located in the hutto park subdivision. 3 bedroom, 2 bath, Garage attached, 2 parking spaces, Spacious patio. 1661 sq footage. Lease is up April 30th 2023. Rent is 1795 a month. Very nice neighborhood. W/D & Fridge not included. I am looking for a rental home in Austin (or surrounding areas). Austin is getting more and more expensive and I'm wanting to keep with the private landlord route! I am a filmmaker in Austin and make decent money as a private contractor but I'm currently working to build my credit as its not doing so great after the pandemic. I have two very friendly, but big dogs. They are well trained, love everyone, and are not destructive to property. I am open to the idea of a roommate, as long as they are cool with my puppers and there's plenty of space for everyone! My budget per month for rent would be around $900-1000. I know that's almost impossible to find in Austin, but that's why I'm posting here, just in case something pops up! Thanks for reading and feel free to reach out with any follow up questions, either as a potential roommate or landlord!

Since then I've tried to find as much side work as I can but competition is fierce out here. If you have any sort of work that needs to be done or think you might be able to help us in any way please call or text me at . I'm a framer by trade but I also do all sorts of remodeling. Tile work, flooring ,grout, just about anything. Today's my last day before they throw me out on the street. It's too cold and I've never been in a situation like this. Please help my family and my self.I'm a 52-year-old man looking for a room for rent in Denton starting at the first of December. I've been in Jamestown, North Dakota for the last 3 months, and am planning to move back to Denton, where I've lived off and on since 1996. I'm drug-free and have an absolutely clean criminal background. I have a rock-solid monthly income from Social Security, and I also will be working a part-time job. Plus, I have a healthy bank balance. I'm currently working on a book project and spend my days out and about. Generally, I'm out the door no later than 8:00am and don't come back till after 5:00p, which means I wouldn't be hanging around inside all day running up your utility bill. Libraries and coffee houses are where I generally hang out doing research for my book. I am a cigarette smoker but will not smoke on your property. I drink a couple of beers in the evening but nothing excessive. I can provide great rental references and have always paid the rent on time. One thing: I'm very quiet and considerate, and expect the same in return, so if you're into blaring a TV or stereo that comes through the walls, hey, that's just not for me. Ditto a barking dog at night. So if you've got an extra room you're looking to make some money from, please feel free to contact me via the CraigsList email relay to start out.I'm posting this to see if someone can help us. My friend and I need a 2 bedroom apartment or house. Are budget is around $1000.00 a month. We both work and would be nice to have something for December. Wanting a furnished bedroom and private bath with utilities included (including WIFI). I will be moving out of state in approximately one year so looking for something temporary until then. I do not smoke. I work full time, of course. I'm quiet, clean, organized. I pay my rent on time, every time. I don't need to be entertained and spend my off-work hours reading, shopping or simply resting. I'm not looking for a relationship and I'm not a housekeeper or caregiver. I love pets of all kinds but have none of my own currently. If you could use some extra income and have an unused bedroom/bath, I'd love to hear from you! I can pay $600 monthly. Thanks for reading! Needing to Move out ASAP from rent house. Looking for serious inquires to take over the lease. Located in the hutto park subdivision. 3 bedroom, 2 bath, Garage attached, 2 parking spaces, Spacious patio. 1661 sq footage. Lease is up April 30th 2023. Rent is 1795 a month. Very nice neighborhood. W/D & Fridge not included. I am looking for a rental home in Austin (or surrounding areas). Austin is getting more and more expensive and I'm wanting to keep with the private landlord route! I am a filmmaker in Austin and make decent money as a private contractor but I'm currently working to build my credit as its not doing so great after the pandemic. I have two very friendly, but big dogs. They are well trained, love everyone, and are not destructive to property. I am open to the idea of a roommate, as long as they are cool with my puppers and there's plenty of space for everyone! My budget per month for rent would be around $900-1000. I know that's almost impossible to find in Austin, but that's why I'm posting here, just in case something pops up! Thanks for reading and feel free to reach out with any follow up questions, either as a potential roommate or landlord!

Text2: Private room in a furnished house for rent! Available immediately !!!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Multi family home for rent. Call today get approved tomorrow. Good credit required must have proof of income. Ask for pictures and how to tour this beautiful shared family home. Move in as soon as before Christmas and get a month free. Call today!! This bright, beautiful & meticulously maintained Six bedroom apartment awaits you! Open floor plan with a spacious living/dining room that flows into the kitchen. The generous size bedroom features an over sized closet with organizer. Slider leading to a private balcony overlooking green space perfect for relaxing. Plenty of closet space through out the unit including an extra storage space off the balcony. Washer & Dryer conveniently placed in the unit. Located close to shopping and public transportation! Quaint and cute home! Relax on the front porch in a quiet country setting with mature trees, yet close to everything. New carpet and backdoor, updated bathroom, new roof (1 1/2 year old), newer appliances and kitchen. Eat in kitchen and large family room with 9ft ceilings. Master bedroom with french doors. Listed as 7 bedroom, but bonus room is easy to use as 2nd bedroom. Huge attic that holds endless possibilities. Enjoy the back yard from the spacious deck...a perfect spot for grilling. Vaulted ceilings in the living room with a beautiful stone wood burning fireplace. Master bath includes a double sink vanity with granite and a nice OVERSIZED SHOWER!!
Step into your new home and be amazed at the fully equipped kitchen with numerous deluxe kitchen cabinets, roll-out pot and pan drawers, and luxury flooring! Newer washer and dryer! 3 baths with beautiful ceramic tile. Live in cool comfort with the brand new central A/C. Large master bedroom with three bay windows. Hi-tech ceiling fans with remote control. Large fenced backyard. Street Parking. Forced air heating. Located immediately south of prestigious Woodruff Place. Great location only 5 minutes from downtown and 7 minutes from the heart of Fountain Square. Easy walking distance to trendy new restaurants, craft beer pubs, and coffee shops
** CALL/TEXT ME TODAY for current specials, with MISSOURI APARTMENT LOCATORS Kansas 8I6-2O3-II86
**Photos courtesy of each listed community. All prices are subject to change. Prices, availability, and specials change daily.

Situated in the heart of Logan Square, where Milwaukee meets California, you’ll find various dining and bar options right outside your doorstep. With the CTA Blue line located a short walk away, you’ll easily access anywhere in downtown Chicago, in addition to O’Hare International airport.

Located on tree-lined boulevards, these luxury apartments feature sleek and airy open concept kitchens with stainless steel appliances, plank flooring, in-unit W/D, and floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping city views. Convenient building amenities include a state-of-the-art fitness center and resident lounge.

Four-legged companions are welcome, although some breed and weight restrictions apply. Parking is available at an additional fee.

SCOTT OWENHSG REALTY1305 WASHINGTON AVENUEST LOUIS MODIRECT #  show contact info
 ** OFFICE # show contact info
TEXT OR CALL FOR AN APPOINTMENT  ---   show contact info


THIS HISTORIC HIGHRISE IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF THE GARMENT DISTRICT DIRECTLY ON WASHINGTON AVENUE.YOU WILL SEE OLD WORLD CHARM AND UNIQUE FEATURES BEGINNING WITH A CHARMING RESTORED LOBBY AND THE ORIGINAL EXQUISITE MIRRORED & PANELED ELEVATOR. 
 OCCUPANCY INSPECTION IS COMPLETE - READY FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN - WALK TO EVERYTHING YOU LOVE DOWNTOWN, 6 BLOCKS TO THE METROLINK. PETS ARE WELCOME WITH A $250 NON-REFUNDABLE DEPOSIT. PARKING IN THE ADJACENT LOT IS $50 PER MONTH...**LITTLE BIT OF BUILDING HISTORY**
The building was already used as artists' lofts in the 1980s; in 1999 it was wholey residential. A 2003 renovation converted it to 33 condominiums. The 2007 expansion of Asynchrony Solutions onto the ground floor resulted in the restoration of long-filled-in windows at the street. Barely visible on the building's west face are the faded remains of numerous advertising signs. Among the more legible ones are ads for Wrigley's Spearmint gum and for the building's one-time tenant, King Bee Hats.

An eye-catching new architectural gem in Bucktown added 298 luxury apartments near the Chicago River in 2021. This commuter-friendly area has quick access to I-94 expressway and the Metra Train Clybourn station. Plus, there are three shopping centers within a 5 to 15-minute walk, nearby classic neighborhood bars, live music venues, art galleries, and diverse restaurants. 

With a nod to the industrial history of the area, the design of this new complex has a mix of industrial elements and modern finishes. This one-of-a-kind property features a sloped roofline with private terraces on select units with views of downtown Chicago.  

The apartments feature pebble oak flooring, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, gas range, grey matte cabinets, Moen matte black fixtures, tall ceilings, large windows, and in-unit front-load washer and dryer.  

Upscale amenities offer great spaces to relax and entertain, including on outdoor resort-inspired pool, sun deck and resident lawn with views of Downtown Chicago. Keep active in the fitness center and make new friends hanging out in the clubhouse lounge with chef kitchen. Bike storage, package service, and a business center are also conveniently available.  

Cats and dogs are allowed with breed restrictions and weight limit. Parking is available with additional fees.

Located near the CTA Western Ave. station, these modern Logan Square apartments offer luxury living in one of Chicago’s most eclectic neighborhoods.  

Apartments here are housed in two buildings, both four stories tall, which are connected by an elevated private courtyard with lovely landscaping. Each unit features tall ceilings, large sunny windows, hardwood floors, and modern kitchens with 5-burner gas range, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and wide-plank wood floors throughout. In-unit washers and dryers are included in all units. Some layouts feature outdoor terraces.
 
Community amenities abound at this boutique property, including a fitness center, resident lounge, and a landscaped courtyard with an outdoor kitchen and comfy patio lounge furniture. Onsite services include a Stockwell smart store, Tide Dry Cleaners, Luxer One Package System, and bicycle storage and repair station. 

Pets are welcome with breed restrictions, and there is an on-site dog washing station. You’ll find the 606 elevated trail and adjacent neighborhood park are nearby within a short walk. 

There are no less than five coffee shops, a wide variety of restaurants and several notable local attractions within in walking distance.  Aldi is the closest large grocery store, but there are several local neighborhood markets that stock your everyday essentials.  

Getting around town is a breeze! There are three bus routes that converge at the intersection down the street, and the CTA Blue Line Western station is less than a 5-minute walk.  Drivers can get to I-90 within a few minutes via Armitage Ave. Also, Metra has two regional trains that stop at the Clybourn Station, about a 25-minute walk, or about 12 minutes via #73 bus. Onsite parking is available with additional fees.

THIS HISTORIC HIGHRISE IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF THE GARMENT DISTRICT DIRECTLY ON WASHINGTON AVENUE.YOU WILL SEE OLD WORLD CHARM AND UNIQUE FEATURES BEGINNING WITH A CHARMING RESTORED LOBBY AND THE ORIGINAL EXQUISITE MIRRORED & PANELED ELEVATOR. 
 OCCUPANCY INSPECTION IS COMPLETE - READY FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN - WALK TO EVERYTHING YOU LOVE DOWNTOWN, 6 BLOCKS TO THE METROLINK. PETS ARE WELCOME WITH A $250 NON-REFUNDABLE DEPOSIT. PARKING IN THE ADJACENT LOT IS $50 PER MONTH...**LITTLE BIT OF BUILDING HISTORY**
The building was already used as artists' lofts in the 1980s; in 1999 it was wholey residential. A 2003 renovation converted it to 33 condominiums. The 2007 expansion of Asynchrony Solutions onto the ground floor resulted in the restoration of long-filled-in windows at the street. Barely visible on the building's west face are the faded remains of numerous advertising signs. Among the more legible ones are ads for Wrigley's Spearmint gum and for the building's one-time tenant, King Bee Hats.

Text2: Quiet 1 Bedroom Near Campus For Fall 2023 w/ Gigabit Internet
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Available for Fall of 2023 (next August)
Looking for a peaceful, quiet place just off campus and close to downtown Champaign for next August? We got you!


If you like units in converted homes, this might be a good match for you. This approximately 500 square foot, upstairs unit features a big bedroom with two closets, a smaller but just-refreshed kitchen (new flooring, cabinets, and new stove) with a breakfast nook, and a cozy living room. The bathroom was just remodeled, too, with new flooring, cabinets, and fixtures. It features a full tub (with a shower head, of course!). And we just finished replacing every window in the unit. 412 W. Green in Champaign is only a half-mile from campus, straight down Green Street. And it's on bus lines. The property is close to shopping, dining, and The Champaign Public Library is just 2 blocks away.  


And it's a great price, too!
So what's a simple, private unit just off-campus with on-site, tenant-only laundry, plenty of parking, additional storage available, that includes water, garbage/recycling, and even heat in the winter go for? How about if we throw in dedicated GIGABIT FIBER OPTIC internet? Would you believe it's just $727 per month? Check out the images below, then contact us for a private tour!

Another option for you with this home, even Owner financing may be negotiated for you REGARDLESS of your credit with this beautifully redone ranch w basement 2 car large corner treed lot with brick walled fireplace, stainless appliances, vinyl fold in windows, wood floors, jacuzzi tub, central air, dining room, cute pedestal sink and corner med cabinet in 1/2 ba, central vac system, vinyl siding and insulated. Located in a nice neighborhood with friendly neighbors, convenient to I-435 and everywhere.

Your name(s),

Thanks, and have a great day!

Live in the heart of St. Louis, where you're always less than 15 minutes away from all things that make St. Louis so unique! You've got the Saint Louis Zoo (free admission), The Fabulous Fox Theater (right next door), The Hill, The Botanical Gardens, Forest Park, close to Downtown St. Louis and the list goes on and on! Be ONE with St. Louis while enjoying your stay at University Plaza Apartments.

The University Plaza Apartment Building, located at 607 North Grand Boulevard in the heart of The Grand Center Arts District, is the perfect home for the busy urban professional. So much character and history, so much to do and see!

Welcome home, you have arrived! We are proud to introduce Tiburon Ridge. This gorgeous BRAND-NEW property located right off of 180th and 370, provides an upscale living experience unlike any other in the area. 
 
Exquisite designs, paired with an ideal location, make our community a top choice for Southwest Omaha and Gretna. Offering one-, two-, or three-bedroom apartment homes, we are sure that you'll find the perfect floor plan for your needs. Offering a rural escape while being minutes from dining, shopping, and entertainment. Tiburon Ridge is located in the Gretna School District with direct access to Highway 370 and I-80, creating a convenient corridor ranging from both downtown Omaha to Lincoln, ensuring you will be at the center of it all. Enjoy a day at Mahoney State Park and dinner in Dundee or a morning of hitting the rinks followed by an afternoon Cornhusker Football game; the possibilities are endless. 
 
Varied floor plan layouts offer unique options including balconies, patios, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, and flex workspace. Well-appointed community space and outdoor amenity options provide a living experience that will not disappoint. Amenities will include a clubhouse, leasing office, outdoor pool, fire pit, fitness center, dog parks, secure package locker system, and storm shelter! 
 
From custom home-like finishes featuring two unique kitchen aesthetics ranging from white to dark scale and wood-inspired flooring, you will be proud to entertain or enjoy a serene sunset on your private balcony. Our apartments have it all! Come live where peacefulness meets convenience and where living meets extraordinary. Tiburon Ridge provides more than an apartment; it is a lifestyle experience. Explore our photo gallery and see for yourself why we're the best fit for you and your lifestyle. To get the full experience, please schedule a visit to our property! 
 
Please call us TODAY and set up a tour of your new home at Tiburon Ridge!

Text2: Looking for city living in St. Louis? Check out The Monticello!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1-Bedroom Apartment Available In The CWE, St. Louis! Perfect Location For Restaurants, Grocery Stores, & Local Attractions Within Walking Distance!

Fairmont Apartments  |  7 Maryland Plaza, St. Louis, MO  |  Central West End



 





General Information

Apartment Type:1-Bedroom Apartment
Square Footage: 542 square feet
Utilities Included: Water, sewer, gas, and trash 
Lease Duration: 6 months to 12 months with options to renew
Rent: $830 per month for a 12-month lease
Deposit: $400 for a 12-month lease
Application Fee: $40 per each applicant or married couple (non refundable)
Laundry: Washer and dryer located on every floor
Parking: Gated, off-street parking for $80 per month (inquire about space availability)







Apartment Features

Comfortable living area
Kitchen equipped with a standard sized refrigerator, full size 4-burner stove top oven & cabinet space, 
Laminate wood flooring throughout living space
Tenth Floor Apartment
Closet for clothes & storage, linen closet in bathroom
Windows allowing natural light
Wall-unit air conditioning and baseboard heating systems for personal temperature control
All appliances are electric
Internet / cable ready








Community & Neighborhood Features
The Fairmont and Monticello Apartments offer both studio and one bedroom apartment homes in a vibrant atmosphere and a GREAT LOCATION! The Central West End is a community where tradition meets modern style, and we are located right in the heart of it all. Both of our buildings provide cozy apartment homes that are appointed with today's modern necessities while also maintaining a historic design full of character and charm!

Our central location means that our residents enjoy easy access to highway 64/40, Forest Park, Whole Foods, Schnucks Grocery Market, Washington University, Saint Louis University, BJC Hospital, and more!  Our vibrant neighborhood offers retail shopping, delectable restaurants, and convenient coffee shops all within a few steps of our front door.  We are also within walking distance to major bus lines and The Metrolink. With close proximity to just about everything, our location simply cannot be beat!

Fitness room 
Cats and dogs are welcome (please contact us for information regarding stipulations, pet deposit, and pet rent)
Elevator
Friendly on-site management
24-hour emergency maintenance
Easy access to Wash U, SLU, BJC Hospital, and Forest Park 
Located near several restaurants, shops, bars, and grocery stores
Public transportation is within walking distance









 Contact Information & Additional Resources
Phone:  show contact info
 | Email: please reply via this posting



If you would like to learn more about our community or our upcoming availability, please reach out to a member of our office staff today!  Our warm and friendly staff members are eager to assist you, and are available to provide tours during our leasing office hours (appointments are encouraged).





Visit Our Websites
To learn more about The Fairmont Apartments you can visit: www.fairmontapts.net


To learn more about The Monticello Apartments you can visit: www.monticelloapts.net





PLEASE NOTE: The pictures provided are NOT of the exact apartment that is available.  These pictures are of an apartment that shares the same exact floor plan, and are an example of how the apartment will look.

Text2: Go outside to a 220 acre park, heat included, dishwasher, allow dogs
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Would you like to live in a park? Huge Green space! 

Looking for someplace not like all the others, a place where Madison's largest park is just across the street? Well, you will love these apartments, directly on Warner Park next to the recreation center with indoor basketball/volleyball courts, a full gym, wide screen TV, and pool tables. The park has Madison's finest dog park and a path that leads you to the lake. There are also baseball diamonds, sled hills, tennis courts, and a playground we have incredible two-bedroom apartments. Some have dishwashers, microwaves, washers, and dryers others with porches overlooking the park. We have many types of buildings that we know you will live in the layout of at least one of them. 

Off-street parking, on site management, means we stand by our neighborhood and understand how to find the best neighbors to move into our community. We allow most dogs but we are a peaceful place and we like our dog breeds that way too! Laundry on-site, tree-lined and jogging trails, ponds for fishing, grills with picnic tables, and even a hockey rink in the winter! Living in one of Madison's largest parks has great value. Trails right to Lake Mendota. Too many amenities in this park to list all of them. 

Low utility costs during winter, we pay heat!! We have remodeled kitchens and on-site laundry! A supermarket Willy Street Co-Op is just blocked away, with a public library, Walgreens, Butter Barbecue, a Dollar Store, an Italian restaurant, and much more. Call today to reserve a showing. We schedule showings all week long with a customer service team that will make time to boast about the best. So call us today!

Dogs and cats are welcome. Some breed restrictions. Welcome home, please call us now for an appointment.

Welcome home, you have arrived! We are proud to introduce Tiburon Ridge. This gorgeous BRAND-NEW property located right off of 180th and 370, provides an upscale living experience unlike any other in the area. 
 
Exquisite designs, paired with an ideal location, make our community a top choice for Southwest Omaha and Gretna. Offering one-, two-, or three-bedroom apartment homes, we are sure that you'll find the perfect floor plan for your needs. Offering a rural escape while being minutes from dining, shopping, and entertainment. Tiburon Ridge is located in the Gretna School District with direct access to Highway 370 and I-80, creating a convenient corridor ranging from both downtown Omaha to Lincoln, ensuring you will be at the center of it all. Enjoy a day at Mahoney State Park and dinner in Dundee or a morning of hitting the rinks followed by an afternoon Cornhusker Football game; the possibilities are endless. 
 
Varied floor plan layouts offer unique options including balconies, patios, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, and flex workspace. Well-appointed community space and outdoor amenity options provide a living experience that will not disappoint. Amenities will include a clubhouse, leasing office, outdoor pool, fire pit, fitness center, dog parks, secure package locker system, and storm shelter! 
 
From custom home-like finishes featuring two unique kitchen aesthetics ranging from white to dark scale and wood-inspired flooring, you will be proud to entertain or enjoy a serene sunset on your private balcony. Our apartments have it all! Come live where peacefulness meets convenience and where living meets extraordinary. Tiburon Ridge provides more than an apartment; it is a lifestyle experience. Explore our photo gallery and see for yourself why we're the best fit for you and your lifestyle. To get the full experience, please schedule a visit to our property! 
 
Please call us TODAY and set up a tour of your new home at Tiburon Ridge!

Text2: It's Available! 1003 Annie Drive, 3 BR 1 BA Townhomes- Winterset
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Bedroom, Single-story Townhomes for rent in Winterset, IA

Did you know you could lease a ranch style townhome for about the same cost as renting an apartment? The conveniences of an apartment with the enjoyment of your own front door, yard, and attached garage. Upgrade your apartment experience to townhome living with Kading!

We offer affordable living with desired amenities such as washer/dryer hook-ups, cable-ready units, air conditioning, ceramic tile flooring in all common areas, and carpeted bedrooms & living rooms. Open concept floor plans provide ultimate flexibility to decorate your personal space and make it your own. Let your kids enjoy a space to play – whether your little humans or your little fur babies. Lawn care, snow management, pet stations, and 24-hour emergency maintenance are provided. We take on the upkeep so you can take back your time!

Enjoy the seasons in Madison County! The irresistible historic town square, the local wineries & eateries, and the six famous covered bridges amidst the rolling emerald hills provide a veritable feast for the senses throughout all four seasons! As the county seat of Madison County, Winterset houses a dazzling French Renaissance Revival-style courthouse as its centerpiece, surrounded by modern commercial businesses to serve your needs while preserving the local heritage and Italianate buildings’ charm.

Glenwood by Kading is conveniently located just two blocks from Highway 169/92 with easy access to downtown Winterset, or to Interstates 35 or 80 if you’re venturing out of town. Though, we’re not sure why you would want to leave! The sense of community pride, friendliness of local shopkeepers, strong schools, and surrounding natural landscape provide that calming, stress-free, small town life; yet only 35 minutes away from all the benefits of the Des Moines metro area!

Kading builds with you in mind. We understand your need for affordable independence. Our team works hard to provide a genuine community feel - a safe haven in a convenient location.

We are dedicated to supporting our residents through superior care and responsiveness to your needs. We offer an online tenant portal making it easy to communicate with us to sign or renew your lease, make timely payments, and place service requests all from the convenience of your laptop, tablet, or smartphone.

We hope you choose to make our house your home!

Welcome home, you have arrived! We are proud to introduce Tiburon Ridge. This gorgeous BRAND-NEW property located right off of 180th and 370, provides an upscale living experience unlike any other in the area. 
 
Exquisite designs, paired with an ideal location, make our community a top choice for Southwest Omaha and Gretna. Offering one-, two-, or three-bedroom apartment homes, we are sure that you'll find the perfect floor plan for your needs. Offering a rural escape while being minutes from dining, shopping, and entertainment. Tiburon Ridge is located in the Gretna School District with direct access to Highway 370 and I-80, creating a convenient corridor ranging from both downtown Omaha to Lincoln, ensuring you will be at the center of it all. Enjoy a day at Mahoney State Park and dinner in Dundee or a morning of hitting the rinks followed by an afternoon Cornhusker Football game; the possibilities are endless. 
 
Varied floor plan layouts offer unique options including balconies, patios, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, and flex workspace. Amenities will include a clubhouse, leasing office, outdoor pool, fire pit, fitness center, dog parks, secure package locker system, and storm shelter! 
 
From custom home-like finishes featuring two unique kitchen aesthetics ranging from white to dark scale and wood-inspired flooring, you will be proud to entertain or enjoy a serene sunset on your private balcony. Our apartments have it all! Come live where peacefulness meets convenience and where living meets extraordinary. Tiburon Ridge provides more than an apartment; it is a lifestyle experience. Text3:

3 Bedroom, Single-story Townhomes for rent in Pleasant Hill, IA

Kading offers affordable living with desired amenities such as washer/dryer hook-ups, cable/internet fiber, air conditioning, ceramic tile flooring in all common areas, and carpeted bedrooms. Open concept floor plans provide ultimate flexibility to decorate your personal space and make it your own. Let your kids enjoy a space to play – whether your little humans or your little fur babies. Lawn care, snow management, pet stations, and 24-hour emergency maintenance are provided.
Yellowbanks by Kading is conveniently located just a stone’s throw from the Highway 65 and 163 interchange, providing super easy access to anywhere in the Metro within 10-20 minutes. Pleasant Hill is a young, vibrant community of around 10,000 residents with the option to choose between two school districts, Des Moines Public Schools or Southeast Polk Community School District.
Pleasant Hill is the center of Des Moines’ playground! Only 5-10 minutes to the Iowa State Fairgrounds, Adventureland Amusement & Waterpark, Prairie Meadows Racetrack & Casino, a multiplex movie theater… imagine how much fun can you have living here! And besides all that fun, it is also an economic hub with access to thriving businesses seeking quality employees, too.
We are dedicated to supporting our residents through superior care and responsiveness to your needs. We offer an online tenant portal making it easy to communicate with us to sign or renew your lease, make timely payments, and place service requests all from the convenience of your laptop, tablet, or smartphone.
We hope you choose to make our house your home!

Kading offers affordable living with desired amenities such as washer/dryer hook-ups, cable/internet fiber, air conditioning, ceramic tile flooring in all common areas, and carpeted bedrooms. Open concept floor plans provide ultimate flexibility to decorate your personal space and make it your own. Let your kids enjoy a space to play – whether your little humans or your little fur babies. Lawn care, snow management, pet stations, and 24-hour emergency maintenance are provided.
Yellowbanks by Kading is conveniently located just a stone’s throw from the Highway 65 and 163 interchange, providing super easy access to anywhere in the Metro within 10-20 minutes. Pleasant Hill is a young, vibrant community of around 10,000 residents with the option to choose between two school districts, Des Moines Public Schools or Southeast Polk Community School District.
Pleasant Hill is the center of Des Moines’ playground! Only 5-10 minutes to the Iowa State Fairgrounds, Adventureland Amusement & Waterpark, Prairie Meadows Racetrack & Casino, a multiplex movie theater… imagine how much fun can you have living here! And besides all that fun, it is also an economic hub with access to thriving businesses seeking quality employees, too.

We hope you choose to make our house your home!

Text2: Upgraded 2 Bed 2 Bath Available at Autumn Grove
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Luxury Apartments in Omaha 

As a resident, your well-being is our greatest concern. With you in mind, Autumn Grove supplies a myriad of amenities, including a fitness center, a cybercafé and gaming room, available to residents living in one of our one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments. Plus, you can’t go wrong with a resort style swimming pool right on the premises! Need a place for your dog to play outside? Our bark park is just the place. Become an all-star chef in our gourmet kitchens that are home to efficient kitchen appliances or spend the evening relaxing on your personal balcony. Skip the lines at the gym and work out at our 24-hour fitness gym or relax in the cybercafé or gaming room with friends! Just imagine, you get all of this simply as part of the Autumn Grove life, and we haven’t even discussed our ideal location in West Omaha. 

Experience a superior level of service and extraordinary amenities when living at Autumn Grove apartments. Don’t waste any more time. Stop by today and see for yourself why Autumn Grove is undoubtedly a top location in Omaha. Contact or visit us today for your personal tour of Autumn Grove! 

 
With so much to offer at Autumn Grove, you’ll never feel the need to leave! The unrivaled experience at Autumn Grove begins with a private tour of our refined, luxury apartments nestled in the heart of our pet friendly community. As soon as you set foot on our grounds, before even stepping through the door frame of your next home, you will be wrapped in the comforts and amenities our neighbors value and cherish. Our Millard apartments in Omaha boast spacious bedroom sizes, beautiful wood style plank floors and lofty ceilings! 

**Please respond to this posting with your first and last name and a valid email for us to contact you with more information!** 

Apartment Amenities 
Additional Storage • Fireplace • Air Conditioner • Garden Soaking Tub • Alarm System • Large Closets • Balcony • Refrigerator • Cable/Internet Ready • Cox Internet service provided with 250Mbps speeds. Upgrades to 1 GIG are available. Modem rental available or residents can supply their own modem. • Carpeting • Ceiling Fan • Disposal • Efficient Appliances • Hardwood Floors • High Ceilings • Microwave • View • Washer/Dryer • Wheelchair Access • Window Coverings 

 Community Amenities 
24 Hour Fitness Gym • Millard School District • Business Center • Professional On-site Maintenance • Club House • Professional On-site Management • Duck Pond • Resort Style Swimming Pool • Gated Community • Remote Access Garages Available • Storm Shelters • BBQ/Picnic Area • Bike Racks • Free Weights • Package Receiving • Recycling • Short Term Lease 
 
Autumn Grove Apartments accepts cats and dogs with a joint pet weight of 80lbs and maximum of two (2) pets per apartment. Dogs under the age of six (6) months are prohibited. Certain breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for more details; 2 pets per apartment. Combined 80 lb. weight limit max. Breed restrictions.

Saturday: 10AM-5PM

Did you know you could lease a ranch style townhome for about the same cost as renting an apartment? The conveniences of an apartment with the enjoyment of your own front door, yard and attached garage. Upgrade your apartment experience to townhome living with Kading!

The outdoor space surrounding this Lakeshore East property is unlike any other area in Chicago. A wide open neighborhood park (with Wi-Fi) is outlined by soaring high rises, creating a unique urban feel in an eco-friendly surrounding. A Mariano’s Fresh Market is only steps away and tons of shops and dining along Michigan Ave and Randolph Street is less than 10 minutes’ walk. Life is good! Access to all of the CTA Trains and the Metra is also close, and you can easily hop on the Lakefront Trail, stroll Millennium Park, or jump on Lake Shore Drive. The property itself offers plenty of amenities such as fitness center, outdoor pool and sundeck, indoor hot tub and sauna with steam rooms, game room, lounge, and business center. Add in a complimentary coffee bar, on-site gourmet Italian cafe and BBQ grilling stations to round out the fun. There is 24-hour security door staff and maintenance.   

These units are practical and well designed, with spacious closets, including walk-ins, full-size, in-home washers and dryers and wonderful floor-to-ceiling windows. Kitchens offer maple cabinets and granite islands and both kitchens and baths have ceramic tile flooring. Even the little things will make a difference such as gas stoves, dishwashers and resident-controlled heating and air conditioning. 

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats are accepted throughout and dogs are welcome on select floors (breed restrictions apply and there is no weight restriction for the first dog).

Among the more legible ones are ads for Wrigley's Spearmint gum and for the building's one-time tenant, King Bee Hats.

Any pets(weight and breed)?
Need parking?
Budget(just rent)?

Looking forward to hearing from you! 

Located within a short walk to four major hospitals, this fully rehabilitated apartment complex brings 272 re-imagined apartments to the Illinois Medical District, just west of downtown Chicago. The 18-story structure, originally built in 1967, completed a full renovation in 2021. 

Renters here can live conveniently close to work in the IMD, while being near plenty of diverse culture, cuisine and recreation to explore in the adjacent West Loop, Little Italy and Pilsen neighborhoods. Downtown and other parts of the city are also easy to access with the CTA Blue Line located just down the street. 

The open concept floor plans are designed with convenience and comfort in mind with modern finishes. Efficient use of space allows each unit to include a washer and dryer, large counters and cabinet storage, stainless steel appliances, gas range, microwave, garbage disposal, and a good amount of closet space.  Modern finishes include white quartz countertops, tundra white cabinets, matte black hardware and grey wood style flooring. 

A brand-new rooftop sundeck allows residents can get sun all day long and enjoy unobstructed views in all directions. Other amenities include a business center, fitness center, bicycle storage and package delivery service.  

Dogs and cats are allowed, and parking is available in the on-site surface lot, with additional fees.

Whether you want a change of scenery or need to move because of your job, these luxury apartments will have you coming home to grand experiences every day. One-bedroom, two-bedroom and three-bedroom units all come with kitchen islands or peninsulas, and rooms are generally spacious. When it comes to amenities, these guys know what folks want. Imagine having access to luxury amenities like an ndoor and outdoor rooftop lounge, fitness center (with private fitness studio),, and coworking space with individual workstations. They even have a 24-hour concierge, ensuring a balanced lifestyle that's both comfortable and convenient for you.

If you consider the accessibility and amenities of a neighborhood, this apartment building is in the Medical Center, located near top employers, hospitals, and the UIC campus. Cats and dogs are accepted throughout (breed and weight restrictions apply) and pet parents will love the on-site full-service pet care and large private dog park.

Text2: $200 Off the first month's rent if leased by 11/23/2022.
Text3:

We have 5 units available. 3 Bedroom, Single-story Townhomes for rent in Indianola, IA

Did you know you could lease a ranch style townhome for about the same cost as renting an apartment? The conveniences of an apartment with the enjoyment of your own front door, yard and attached garage. Upgrade your apartment experience to townhome living with Kading!

We offer affordable living with desired amenities such as washer/dryer hook-ups, cable ready units, air conditioning, ceramic tile flooring in all common areas and carpeted bedrooms & living rooms. Open concept floor plans provide ultimate flexibility to decorate your personal space and make it your own. Let your kids enjoy a space to play – whether your little humans or your little fur babies. Lawn care, snow management, pet stations, and 24-hour emergency maintenance are provided. We take on the upkeep so you can take back your time!

You will find Indianola to be a great place to live and work. Located just 15 minutes from the Des Moines International Airport, Indianola is the county seat of Warren County and has wonderful local schools. Home to the National Balloon Museum and the annual National Balloon Classic, a week-long festival of hot-air ballooning events and exhibitions with participants from all over the world, Indianola is a colorful place to be!

Indoor and outdoor activities abound with the Des Moines Metro Opera and Simpson College both residing here, as well as the beauty and relaxation of Lake Ahquabi State Park…a great escape from the summer heat! Spend some time perusing the Buxton Park Arboretum or get active on the over eight miles of trails offered within the city of Indianola. From biking to hiking, arts to opera, this small, historic town with modern conveniences makes Indianola a great place to call home.

Kading builds with you in mind. We understand your need for affordable independence. Our team works hard to provide a genuine community feel - a safe haven in a convenient location.

We are dedicated to supporting our residents through superior care and responsiveness to your needs. We offer an online tenant portal making it easy to communicate with us to sign or renew your lease, make timely payments, and place service requests all from the convenience of your laptop, tablet, or smartphone.

We hope you choose to make our house your home!

3 Bedroom, Single-story Townhomes for rent in Altoona, IA

Did you know you could lease a ranch style townhome for about the same cost as renting an apartment? The conveniences of an apartment with the enjoyment of your own front door, yard, and attached garage. Upgrade your apartment experience to townhome living with Kading!

Text2: Hyde Park Stunner! 4bd/2bth! Hardwoods! Character! W/D! Balcony!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A Hyde park stunner on an amazing lot with beautiful balcony views! 
A large front porch greets you upon arrival. 
Enjoy this three story floor plan with a beautiful foyer entry with bench, opening up into a living room with decorative fireplace and separate dining room! 
Original crown molding throughout gives this home that amazing character we love in Hyde Park! 
A clean, white kitchen houses newer cabinets, gas range, fridge, and stainless steel dishwasher! 
Off the kitchen is the first of two back decks, overlooking the beautiful fenced-in backyard! Designated fire pit, and seating area and plenty of shade!
A half story down takes you to a full bathroom with walk-in shower.
Another level down houses a full-size washer and dryer provided by the owner. Large basement with high ceilings and room for plenty of storage!
The second floor contains three of the bedrooms and another full sized bathroom. Gorgeously upgraded with a clawfoot tub, stunning new fixtures, and original hexagon tile!
The third floor, houses the large, fourth bedroom that opens up into your second balcony! Take in the amazing views off the back balcony towards downtown Kansas City!
1-2 off street parking spots + easy street parking. 
Google Fiber enabled. 

UNIT AMENITIES
Air conditioner, Ceiling fan, Dishwasher, Dryer, Fenced yard, Handrails, Hardwood floors, Heat, Mirrors, Pantry, Private balcony, Private patio, Refrigerator, Stove and oven, Tile floors, View, Washer, Window coverings

Text2: Hyde Park Stunner! 4bd/2bth! Hardwoods! Character! W/D! Balcony!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A Hyde park stunner on an amazing lot with beautiful balcony views! 
A large front porch greets you upon arrival. 
Enjoy this three story floor plan with a beautiful foyer entry with bench, opening up into a living room with decorative fireplace and separate dining room! 
Original crown molding throughout gives this home that amazing character we love in Hyde Park! 
A clean, white kitchen houses newer cabinets, gas range, fridge, and stainless steel dishwasher! 
Off the kitchen is the first of two back decks, overlooking the beautiful fenced-in backyard! Designated fire pit, and seating area and plenty of shade!
A half story down takes you to a full bathroom with walk-in shower.
Another level down houses a full-size washer and dryer provided by the owner. Large basement with high ceilings and room for plenty of storage!
The second floor contains three of the bedrooms and another full sized bathroom. Gorgeously upgraded with a clawfoot tub, stunning new fixtures, and original hexagon tile!
The third floor, houses the large, fourth bedroom that opens up into your second balcony! Take in the amazing views off the back balcony towards downtown Kansas City!
1-2 off street parking spots + easy street parking. 
Google Fiber enabled. 

UNIT AMENITIES
Air conditioner, Ceiling fan, Dishwasher, Dryer, Fenced yard, Handrails, Hardwood floors, Heat, Mirrors, Pantry, Private balcony, Private patio, Refrigerator, Stove and oven, Tile floors, View, Washer, Window coverings

Property Address

4817 Chicago St. #01 | Omaha, NE 68132





Offered By

Thrive Street Living (a division of JGC Investments LLC)




  Description
  
    Located in the Dundee neighborhood just off Underwood St, Buckingham Manor showcases the best of what this beautiful location is known for. The Dundee – Happy Hollow Historic District is located west of Midtown Crossing and near the University of Nebraska Medical Center (UNMC). From its charming streets lined with cast iron lamps to its vibrant retail area with wonderful restaurants, the Dundee neighborhood is a popular place to visit and one of the best communities to call home. Nestled amidst other beautiful Colonial, Tudor, and Georgian residences, Buckingham is a picturesque example of what the community has to offer its residents.

From the outside, the cedar-shake roof and original brick exterior gives the building its charismatic appeal. Inside, the property is full of old-world charm with detailed, rustic arches, carved woodwork, hardwood floors and a gorgeous central courtyard available for tenant get-togethers or quiet enjoyment.

DETAILS:
•	Large (1) 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom, and 3 bedroom units (pending availability)
•	Laundry facilities are located on the first floor of the building
•	Tenants pay all utilities, except trash

  Description
  
    Located in a historic part of our city, Harney Square is a quint, charming complex just steps from Blackstone District and a few blocks from Midtown Crossing.  Blackstone District showcases contemporary dining, nightlife, shopping and living experiences as diverse as the area itself while Midtown Crossing is home to vibrant mix of nearly 40 restaurants, retailers and service providers with a beautiful park hosting Omaha’s top free concerts, festivals, and so much more.

Harney Square has updated amenities. All the building’s windows have been recently replaced, along with the roof, gutters, and much of the concrete sidewalks. Many of the units also feature refinished hardwood floors, new carpet in the bedrooms, and new kitchen floors. An outdoor courtyard is available for tenant get-togethers or quiet enjoyment. The building is five minutes away from Dundee and blocks from the University of Nebraska Medical Center (UNMC), making it ideal for medical students and residents.

Text2: Large 4,300 sq. ft home in Miami Heights
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

    
      Large 4,300 sq. ft home in Miami Heights Neighborhood
    
  
  
  
Property Address

2604 N 32nd Ave | Omaha, NE 68111


  Available: Now



Offered By

Thrive Street Living (a division of JGC Investments LLC) |  show contact info
 




  Description
  
    Located near Salem Baptist church in the newer Miami Heights neighborhood, this gorgeous 4,300 square foot home for rent has 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a fireplace, a 3-car garage, and a whole lot of entertaining space in the newly built-out, fully-finished basement. This home sits right off the interstate and is a 5-minute drive to downtown, Midtown, or Blackstone District. Brand new refinished oak floors throughout the main floor, newer custom hardwood cabinets, 6 panel doors, 5.5 inch poplar baseboard throughout, crown molding, Nine-foot ceilings, and a full wet bar in the basement are just a few amenities that make this house a joy to come home to each day.

GENERAL INFORMATION:

3-year lease

No Pets

Exact Sq. Ft:  4,295

Basement: 1,500 sq ft. 100% finished, custom wet bar, large bathroom with tiled walk-in shower & a double sink vanity, bedroom with closet, large storage area, sliding doors for a walk-out-to patio view, spacious entertaining area.

Bathrooms: Three full bathrooms (showers, toilet, tub, sink(s); One powder room (toilet, sink)

Bedrooms: 5 total bedrooms (4 spacious bedrooms with walk-in closets upstairs (one is the master bedroom) and 1 bedroom in the basement.)

Fireplace: Gas fireplace on main floor.

Included Appliances: Refrigerator (kitchen), dish washer (kitchen), microwave (kitchen), beverage fridge (basement), dishwasher (basement)

Yard: Fully fenced in 6-ft cedar privacy fence with beautiful landscaping in front.

Pets: Inquire on pet policy. A refundable pet deposit and/or a non-refundable pet fee is required.

Rental Assistance: We do not accept Section 8 or rental assistance on this property. Inquire on pet policy. All appliances are included in rent price except a washer/dryer (though we can provide for an additional fee). 

MAIN LEVEL:

Open concept layout including dining room, kitchen, living room, laundry room, office, and beautiful staircase to upper level.

Kitchen: Extra-large kitchen with walk-in pantry, custom-built hardwood cabinetry, granite countertops, large island, and stainless-steel appliances (refrigerator, oven/stove, and microwave). A bump-out with large bay windows is perfect for an eat-in table area.

Walk-out sliding glass doors to deck: Kitchen opens to huge maintenance-free deck area with new custom railing and nice view of Omaha. 

Living room with fireplace: Large living room with built-in custom cabinetry, gas fireplace, and many windows.

Office: Glass French doors open to an inviting well-sized office with windows.

Dining room: Open concept dining room to the right as you enter the main doors. A lighted archway built-in provides a great area to feature your favorite artwork.

Laundry room: Main-floor laundry room is super convenient. Dedicated custom cabinetry, countertop, and hanging rack with hook-ups for full-sized washer and dryer.

UPPER LEVEL: 

Generous layout on upper floor including four bedrooms with walkway/handrail overlooking main level.

Bedroom 1 (Master bedroom/bathroom): French doors open to a large master bedroom with crown molding and accent lighting on ceiling. Room for a small sitting area. Attached Master bathroom with tons of custom white cabinetry, double sinks, whirlpool tub, shower, toilet and extra-large walk-in closet. 

Bedroom 2: Extra large bedroom with walk-in closet and vaulted ceiling. Large bay window with upper arched window. 

Bedroom 3: large bedroom with generous closet space, 9 ft ceiling, and large window.

Bedroom 4: large bedroom with generous closet space, 9 ft ceiling, and large window.

Hallway Bathroom: large bathroom with double-sink vanity, and bath-fitter shower and tub.

LOWER (BASEMENT) LEVEL:

Open concept/walk-out basement including a large bathroom, bedroom, entertaining area/living room, full wet-bar, large storage area, and walk-out doors onto lower-level cement patio

Bathroom: Large walk-in custom tile shower with two shower heads including a wall mounted showerhead and a ceiling rain-head. Double-sink vanity, toilet, and lots of custom cabinets for storage.

Bedroom: includes closet and window.

Entertaining/living room: Open-concept, large room. Includes built-in bookshelves and archway with lighting to display your favorite artwork. 

Storage: Two large storage rooms with built-in shelving.

Wet bar: Custom black granite countertops with pendant accent lighting, dark cherry soft-close custom cabinets, beverage fridge, dishwasher, and sink. 

Walk-out: sliding glass doors walk out to lower-level patio.

OUTSIDE:

Entire house has been newly painted

New roof

New custom railing on maintenance-free deck

Concrete lower-level patio

6-ft privacy fence

Finished landscaping in front

Text2: Luxury 2Bdrm/Bath/Garage
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome to Edgewood Village Apartments!

These striking, two-bedroom/two-bath, newly built luxury apartments featuring a full suite of Frigidaire Gallery appliances (including an in-unit, full-size washer and dryer pair!), tons of cabinets and a giant island, lots of windows, Central Air and attached two-car garage make this worth checking out. Every unit even features a built-in gas fireplace! Walk-in closet in the Master Suite, full-width closet in the second bedroom, a linen closet in the hallway and a coat closet near the entrance will handle just about everything you can store. Enjoy the country air on a warm night from your patio or balcony. 200Mbps Internet and 140 Channels of Cable are part of the deal, too, just because! We even clear the snow and take care of the yard. Just come – and LIVE.

The floor plans range from 1189 to 1402 square feet! That's HUGE!

Located just a block from the iconic It Ain't Heaven and minutes from everything else growing Mukwonago has to offer (Fork in the Road Kitchen, Huge YMCA, Elegant Farmer, Pro Health Care Hospital) and many other downtown shopping, dining and entertainment options. Two minutes away is Miniwaukan Park and it's dog-friendly grounds, and you're moments from the Mukwonago River Canoe Access. Enjoy easy access to I-43 for a quick 15 minute drive to Southridge or take a ten-minute country drive to everything Waukesha. This may just be the perfect spot.

Available NOW (we're actually a little ahead of schedule!) with a great move-in rate: $1550-1750/month with garbage removal, internet and basic cable included. 
One-Year Lease. Security Deposit of $1500.
Tenant pays what you use: Gas, Electric and Water with separate meters for all.

Dogs, up to 35 lbs. (maximum two fur-babies), are allowed in this great west-suburban location.

Text2: 1st Floor Convenience!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome home, you have arrived! We are proud to introduce Tiburon Ridge. This gorgeous BRAND-NEW property located right off of 180th and 370, provides an upscale living experience unlike any other in the area. 
 
Exquisite designs, paired with an ideal location, make our community a top choice for Southwest Omaha and Gretna. Offering one-, two-, or three-bedroom apartment homes, we are sure that you'll find the perfect floor plan for your needs. Offering a rural escape while being minutes from dining, shopping, and entertainment. Tiburon Ridge is located in the Gretna School District with direct access to Highway 370 and I-80, creating a convenient corridor ranging from both downtown Omaha to Lincoln, ensuring you will be at the center of it all. Enjoy a day at Mahoney State Park and dinner in Dundee or a morning of hitting the rinks followed by an afternoon Cornhusker Football game; the possibilities are endless. 
 
Varied floor plan layouts offer unique options including balconies, patios, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, and flex workspace. Well-appointed community space and outdoor amenity options provide a living experience that will not disappoint. Amenities will include a clubhouse, leasing office, outdoor pool, fire pit, fitness center, dog parks, secure package locker system, and storm shelter! 
 
From custom home-like finishes featuring two unique kitchen aesthetics ranging from white to dark scale and wood-inspired flooring, you will be proud to entertain or enjoy a serene sunset on your private balcony. Our apartments have it all! Come live where peacefulness meets convenience and where living meets extraordinary. Tiburon Ridge provides more than an apartment; it is a lifestyle experience. Explore our photo gallery and see for yourself why we're the best fit for you and your lifestyle. To get the full experience, please schedule a visit to our property! 
 
Please call us TODAY and set up a tour of your new home at Tiburon Ridge! 
 
*Prices, specials and availability subject to change at any time* 
 
https://www.tiburonridge.com/ 
 
Equal Opportunity Housing 
Professionally managed by Lund Company

The Boulevard Townhomes participates in an affordable housing program. Household income & student status limitations apply. Total household income must be UNDER the following limits based on household size: 

Monthly gross income must be at least $1,800.00 per household.

Maximum Annual (Yearly) Household Income Allowances:
 1 Person = up to $40,080.00 a year.
 2 Person = up to $45,840.00 a year.
 3 Person = up to $51,540.00 a year.
 4 Person = up to $57,240.00 a year.

PLEASE NOTE: Households consisting of all full-time students do not qualify for tax credit /affordable housing. If there are students in the household, at least one member of the household must be a part-time student. Student status is based on the calendar year, not the move-in date. If you/your household members are students, please contact our Office for more details.

Pets are welcome. Breed restrictions apply. Two pets minimum per household. There is a $300.00 pet deposit, per pet. And $150.00 is refundable at the time of move-out if the pet has not caused any damage. Monthly pet rent, per pet is $15.00.

Text2: We have a townhome here at The Boulevard with your name on it
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We are accepting wait list applications now.

Discover a luxurious lifestyle at The Boulevard Townhomes where our community amenities will amaze you! 

Let your Little Ones enjoy our outdoor playground and community center. Our community is Pet Friendly! We’re near the Springfield public transportation bus lines. And we are close to food, shopping, and entertainment.

Each of our homes include a washer and dryer, black, G.E. electric appliances and a garbage disposal in the kitchen, and wood laminate flooring and carpet throughout, and so much more. 

There are so many reasons to love The Boulevard. You’ll just have to see it to believe it!

The monthly rent for a townhome is $815.00.
And the monthly rent for an apartment is $790.00.

There is a $25.00 Application Fee (per adult 18 yrs. of age and older.)
And a $300.00 to $660.00 Security Deposit with approved credit.

The Boulevard Townhomes participates in an affordable housing program. Household income & student status limitations apply. Total household income must be UNDER the following limits based on household size: 

Monthly gross income must be at least $1,800.00 per household.

Maximum Annual (Yearly) Household Income Allowances:
 1 Person = up to $40,080.00 a year.
 2 Person = up to $45,840.00 a year.
 3 Person = up to $51,540.00 a year.
 4 Person = up to $57,240.00 a year.

PLEASE NOTE: Households consisting of all full-time students do not qualify for tax credit /affordable housing. If there are students in the household, at least one member of the household must be a part-time student. Student status is based on the calendar year, not the move-in date. If you/your household members are students, please contact our Office for more details.

Pets are welcome. Breed restrictions apply. Two pets minimum per household. There is a $300.00 pet deposit, per pet. And $150.00 is refundable at the time of move-out if the pet has not caused any damage. Monthly pet rent, per pet is $15.00. 

You've been looking for the perfect place to call home and now your search is over. Call our professional staff today at  show contact info
 to set up your personal tour of our amazing homes and community! 

Office Hours:
Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-5:00PM

UTILIZE THIS PROGRAM TO LEASE AND/OR BUY IN THE FUTURE THIS Great home with 4 bedrooms, 2 full baths and one car garage with double driveway. Two kitchens make it ideal for a Mother-In-Law suite or entertaining. Large deck off upper level kitchen. There are 2 bedrooms and one bath on each level. Ceramic tile floor in lower level kitchen that has refrigerator, electric range/oven, microwave, sink, disposal, and dishwasher. Upper level kitchen has refrigerator, microwave, and sink. All appliances except washer/dryer are included. Laundry hookups are in a utility closet off the lower level kitchen. Walk out from lower level kitchen into the side yard. Large corner level lot with two sheds. Freshly painted interior.

Text2: Spacious 1 br with dining room, sunroom
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Spacious, Gracious East Ravenswood. Renting an amazing, unique apartment as I am moving out of state. Great, responsive landlords, great neighbors, great location—I could not recommend this apartment more and am sad to leave! 

Available 12/15. This is an oversized one bedroom unit on a walk up first floor on tree-lined Wolcott Ave with four very large rooms, a decorative fireplace in the living room, modern cabinet kitchen, dishwasher, separate pantry, three large closets, king-size bedroom, hardwood floors, fans, miniblinds. In addition, the unit has a gorgeous sun room which can be used as an office or other work space or fold out a futon for a guest. Laundry and free storage sheds in building. Super easy walk to Montrose stop, Brown Line. Cats OK, sorry no dogs. PRICE INCLUDES HEAT! $300 move in fee for one person or $450 for two. $150 cat fee for one cat or $200 for two. Enjoy two nearby coffee stores (Spoken Cafe and Starbucks), plentiful restaurants, bars and shops along Montrose and Lincoln Ave - Spacca Napoli, Culver’s, Margie's Candies, Hazel, catch a concert at Old Town or a movie at the Davis!! A really unbeatable area. I've always found nearby street parking.

Spacious, Gracious East Ravenswood. Renting an amazing, unique apartment as I am moving out of state. Great, responsive landlords, great neighbors, great location—I could not recommend this apartment more and am sad to leave! 

Available 12/15. This is an oversized one bedroom unit on a walk up first floor on tree-lined Wolcott Ave with four very large rooms, a decorative fireplace in the living room, modern cabinet kitchen, dishwasher, separate pantry, three large closets, king-size bedroom, hardwood floors, fans, miniblinds. In addition, the unit has a gorgeous sun room which can be used as an office or other work space or fold out a futon for a guest. Laundry and free storage sheds in building. Super easy walk to Montrose stop, Brown Line. Cats OK, sorry no dogs. PRICE INCLUDES HEAT! $300 move in fee for one person or $450 for two. $150 cat fee for one cat or $200 for two. Enjoy two nearby coffee stores (Spoken Cafe and Starbucks), plentiful restaurants, bars and shops along Montrose and Lincoln Ave - Spacca Napoli, Culver’s, Margie's Candies, Hazel, catch a concert at Old Town or a movie at the Davis!! A really unbeatable area. I've always found nearby street parking.

Text3:

We are accepting wait list applications now.

Discover a luxurious lifestyle at The Boulevard Townhomes where our community amenities will amaze you! 

Let your Little Ones enjoy our outdoor playground and community center. Our community is Pet Friendly! We’re near the Springfield public transportation bus lines. And we are close to food, shopping, and entertainment.

Each of our homes include a washer and dryer, black, G.E. electric appliances and a garbage disposal in the kitchen, and wood laminate flooring and carpet throughout, and so much more. 

There are so many reasons to love The Boulevard. You’ll just have to see it to believe it!

The monthly rent for a townhome is $815.00.
And the monthly rent for an apartment is $790.00.

There is a $25.00 Application Fee (per adult 18 yrs. of age and older.)
And a $300.00 to $660.00 Security Deposit with approved credit.

The Boulevard Townhomes participates in an affordable housing program. Household income & student status limitations apply. Total household income must be UNDER the following limits based on household size: 

Monthly gross income must be at least $1,800.00 per household.

Maximum Annual (Yearly) Household Income Allowances:
 1 Person = up to $40,080.00 a year.
 2 Person = up to $45,840.00 a year.
 3 Person = up to $51,540.00 a year.
 4 Person = up to $57,240.00 a year.

PLEASE NOTE: Households consisting of all full-time students do not qualify for tax credit /affordable housing. If there are students in the household, at least one member of the household must be a part-time student. Student status is based on the calendar year, not the move-in date. If you/your household members are students, please contact our Office for more details.

Pets are welcome. Breed restrictions apply. Two pets minimum per household. There is a $300.00 pet deposit, per pet. And $150.00 is refundable at the time of move-out if the pet has not caused any damage. Monthly pet rent, per pet is $15.00. 

You've been looking for the perfect place to call home and now your search is over. Call our professional staff today at  show contact info

Text2: Lease 1-5 Yrs w/ OPTION to buy! Must have 620+ FICO score or better
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The description for this home is in the second paragraph, but for clarity, this is a rent/lease option program. You are allowed to stay up to 5 years, but only have to agree to a one year lease. You may purchase the home at anytime, if you so choose. This is a 45-60 day process once we have secured the home you chose. Our office has conducted over 80 transactions with this investment firm, so if you are NOT working with an agent, please contact me with your name and email address, and or phone number, and I will email you an invite to the program so you can navigate, and see if this program is for you. This is not a listing of Re/Max Premiere Realty, but when you send me your information, I will email you an invite to the program where you can register and see this house and others.

UTILIZE THIS PROGRAM TO LEASE AND/OR BUY IN THE FUTURE THIS charming 3 bed/2 bath home in Parkway schools! From the moment you pull up, you'll notice the quiet street and great curb appeal. As you enter, you can tell this home was well taken care of - you'll see gleaming wood floors throughout and will appreciate the updated 6" trim and two panel arched doors. Natural light streams into the open floor plan that is perfect for comfortable living and entertaining. You'll imagine cozy dinners by the woodburning fireplace and will picture yourself in the gorgeous kitchen with breakfast bar, granite countertops, gas range, and stainless appliances. French doors lead to the private and fenced backyard with deck & patio. The primary bedroom boasts an en-suite bath. Two additional bedrooms and another bathroom round out the main level. The finished basement provides even more room to spread out, including a living area, bar, and a finished room that could be used as an office. Attached oversized garage.

• Want to live in a single-family home, in a great community with quality schools
• Are a first-time homebuyer who’s cautious about buying a home now, but may want to buy in the future
• Are a home seeker in the process of relocating but aren’t sure where you want to settle down
• Can’t obtain a mortgage right now
Contact me today for more information and details about the program



Sincerely,

Re/Max Premiere Realty

As you enter, you can tell this home was well taken care of - you'll see gleaming wood floors throughout and will appreciate the updated 6" trim and two panel arched doors. Natural light streams into the open floor plan that is perfect for comfortable living and entertaining. You'll imagine cozy dinners by the woodburning fireplace and will picture yourself in the gorgeous kitchen with breakfast bar, granite countertops, gas range, and stainless appliances. French doors lead to the private and fenced backyard with deck & patio. The primary bedroom boasts an en-suite bath. Two additional bedrooms and another bathroom round out the main level. The finished basement provides even more room to spread out, including a living area, bar, and a finished room that could be used as an office. Attached oversized garage.

Text2: Senior Living 55+ Community
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Asbury Apartments offer an independent 55+ community located on the west end of Dubuque at 4885 Asbury Road, just west of the NW Arterial. A large number and variety of businesses are only a few blocks away and include grocery shopping, crafts, dining, retail shopping, and entertainment venues. A drive of fewer than two miles will bring you to area churches, Asbury Park, Althaus Nature area, and Cloie Creek Park. Nearby public transportation can get you everywhere else in the city.

Our apartments are spacious, and many have ADA accommodations. Apartments include dual heat and air conditioning, stove, fridge, and microwave, and many include a dishwasher. All apartments have a combination of carpeting and laminate/tile floors, and all windows have cordless blinds. We are a pet-friendly and smoke-free community striving to offer a quiet and stress-free environment in which to create new friendships, explore interests, and finally simplify life. Free on-site laundry, community spaces, wooded outdoor areas to explore, safe pet relief areas, off-street parking, and more. Resident safety is important to us, the entire exterior area of our campus is brightly lit at night while our interior areas, including each apartment, have sprinklers and smoke detectors

Rent includes water, garbage, and sewer and internet. Residents pay for electricity, cable and phone options. Veteran discounts apply. Those with disabilities will find a number of excellent apartments to fit most needs and an elevator able to accommodate most power scooters connects both levels.

Our 1 BR rents range from $750/mo to $950/mo depending upon apartment size. Pets are welcome and pet fees do apply. It is a Non-Smoking campus.  An apartment walk-thru and campus tour can be arranged. Please note: Asbury Apartments is a 55+ community without children.

We currently have a 1 BR available for $750, $825 and $950 all available Dec 1st. We also have a 2 BR available Dec 1 for $1025.  For further information, please contact  us @  show contact info
.
