Text2: BEAUTIFUL 3/2 Home in Overbrook-Central AC
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Come tour this well kept, immaculate three bedroom, two full bath Ranch home in a desirable neighborhoood and see for yourself just how charming it is, both inside and out! This attractive property offers many interior and exterior features and updates, including a new lifetime dimensional shingled roof with 130 mph wind rating (installed in November 2021), newer engineered hardwood flooring in the living room, newer carpet, new front door, and storm door. The sellers have also enlarged the back deck (now 29' x 15'), changed the location of the sliding glass door and window to create a better flow, and added the 16' x 12' shed with loft and workbench, garage shelving and workbench, a keypad entry to the front door, landscaping and the playset in the past few years. The house features oversized bedrooms, lots of natural light, a split bedroom design, lots of storage, and a wonderful backyard and privacy fence. The current owners love the neighbors and the neighborhood and the convenience to Lakeside Elementary School, which is within walking distance. You will love the close proximity to Lake Monroe (only three miles to the nearest boat ramp and Fairfax Beach) for lots of fun in the sun. You're only three miles from Highway 37 as well, which is very handy for Crane commuters or anyone needing to zip up the I-69 Interstate. Enjoy the benefits of a rural subdivision with the convenience of being close to everything in lovely Lakewood Hills! Notes: Playset stays. Please note it on a separate addendum if a lender is involved. Excludes garage fridge.

All of our apartments have a fully-equipped kitchen, fireplaces and washer/dryer connections in select homes. Take advantage of these features as one of our residents! We are only a few minutes from Frederick Square Shopping Center and Rockbrook Village Shopping Center. Centre Ridge Apartments are near several colleges and universities such as Creighton University, Metropolitan Community College, University of Nebraska at Omaha, and Vatterott College. Rehabbed four bedroom, three full bath with tons of living space. Built-in bookshelves surround a beautiful decorative fireplace in the spacious living room. Chicago’s lakefront is located just four blocks east, featuring tons of outdoor activities including biking, running, golf, tennis, baseball, and swimming in Lake Michigan. Conveniently, the #22 Clark street bus stop is located less than a block away its route goes downtown all night. Parking is available at this location.

Text2: 1 BEDROOM 1 BATH with Den!!!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The Apartments @ Lux 96 is Luxury living in the heart of Papillion. With spacious apartment homes and high-end finishes, you will finally feel like you are home. When you step outside your door you have ease of access to fantastic shopping, dining and outdoor recreation, like the Papio Creek Trail. Enjoy the amazing on-site features when you soak in the sun at our resort-style pool. Relax with friends around our outdoor fire pit or hit the gym at our 24-hour fitness center. 
We don't want you to simply live here, we want you to love living here. 

Enjoy Your Community Amenities:
*Attached Garages
*Instant Access to Cox Gigablast High Speed Internet
*Luxury Clubhouse 
*Off Street Parking
*On-Site Maintenance
*On-Site Management
*Resort Style Heated Pool
*Upscale 24 Hour Fitness Center 

Arrive Home To: 
*Air Conditioner
*Cable Ready
*Carpeting
*Dishwasher
*Disposal
*Large Closets
*Microwave
*Patio/Balcony
*Refrigerator
*Beautiful Views
*Full Size Washer/Dryer 
*Wheelchair Access
*Window Coverings
*Pet Friendly

https://www.facebook.com/lux96apartments/
For more information, visit us online @ Lux96apartments.com

Text2: 1 Bedroom - Quiet and Clean
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment home near Kemper Center and downtown Kenosha. Kitchen has stove and refrigerator with a ceiling fan. Hardwood floors throughout the apartment. Bay windows accentuate the living room and dining/sewing/library room. There is a walk-in closet, a 1-bedroom suitable for a single person or couple, and bathroom with tub/shower. Curtains, blinds, and air conditioner are in the apartment. The apartment comes unfurnished.

The building is inhabited by single professionals who are responsible and respectful. The building is a quite complex and totally smoke free. We are looking for a responsible tenant that respects others and the property, therefore no subleasing, no pets or visiting pets, no smoking or visitors that smoke, and no playing of muscial instruments.

Monthly rent is from $750, and heat and electricity are not included. We pay for water, sewer, and garbage pickup. Security deposit is $750, the same as one month's rent. A one year lease with rent paid on a monthly basis.

In your inquiry, please include employment information, rental history, and any other pertinent information, and FIRST AND LAST NAME OF ADULT for consideration. Sorry, we do not accept housing.

Must furnish proof of employment, income, past rental history, and credit history. We will check background and references. No evictions.

We value our current tenants and wish to protect our current tenants, so we must wait for a suitable applicant. Thank you for viewing this post.

Welcome to life at Reserve at Eagle Ridge Apartment Homes! Our community offers spacious and affordable studio, one and two-bedroom apartments for rent in Waukegan, that are perfectly priced for any budget while also providing a level of luxury that is unmatched in the area. When you tour one of our many floor plans, you will notice that we have designed our apartments with your comfort in mind. Enjoy a private patio/balcony, walk-in closets, select units with washer and dryer and other great amenities. Not only will the inside of our apartments provide you with comfort and convenience, but our community features will as well. Relax out by the swimming pool or soak up the sun on our spacious sundeck. Our fully-equipped fitness center is available to all residents, so you can save time and money on a gym membership. Reserve at Eagle Ridge is proud to welcome your furry friends into our community by offering pet-friendly apartments and a private Dog Park to Waukegan residents. Our residents enjoy living minutes from Lake Michigan and the Great Lakes Naval Base. We are also conveniently located near major employers including Abbott Labs and Medline with easy access to major highways US 41 and I-94. Text2: Beautiful Bungelow Within Walking Distance to Queeny Park
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1203 Miremont Dr. Ballwin, MO 63011  show contact info


Enjoy all of the benefits of the excellent location that this 4 Bedroom, 1 ½ bath, 1400 sq ft home has to offer. Charming bungalow with style. About 200 sq feet in finished basement for storage. Wonderful, very safe neighborhood with highly rated schools, close to everything including Costco, Home Depot, and shopping. Rent is $2150/mo, with one month’s deposit. A medium sized dog is permitted, with a $250 pet deposit, and $25/mo pet fee. We take care of sewer. Utilities and lawn maintenance are tenant’s responsibility. We are looking for a 1 year lease or better.

This home has just been completely re-done. Professionally repainted throughout, new roof, new tiling in kitchen and upstairs bath, including bathtub surround. Hardwood and tile flooring throughout, with carpet in bedrooms. Brand new washer and dryer also included. Refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and oven are also included.

Lower level has enormous master suite (4th bedroom), including two large closets that span the length of the room. Or use it as a large recreation area, complete with cable set up, windows, bathroom and walkout access to a large, green and quiet backyard. Off-street asphalt driveway and asphalt pad will accommodate parking for up to 4 cars.

This home is not for sale, no broker, property management, or real estate company assistance is needed. We must speak with the actual tenant who will be residing in the property. Meeting in person is a must during daylight hours. Please contact Susan or Rick at via CALL to set up an appointment to see this beautiful property. Contact me via e-mail for a rental application. An open house with rental applications will be held soon. This property won’t last, priority will be given to early applicants.

Credit check of 650+, criminal background check in Missouri/Illinois, and employment verification will all be performed. A non-refundable fee of $45 will be assessed for background checks.

Modern finishes including kitchen with quartz counter tops, two-tone cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and smart lighting.  Bathrooms feature Bluetooth speaker system, illuminated mirrors, subway tile,  and "floating" vanities with storage!  Master bedroom can accommodate a king size bed and master bath has double vanity.  Second bedroom is queen size with large closet.  Full size, in unit washer/dryer.  This top floor unit has floor to ceiling windows, amazing natural light and tree top views.  USB outlets and smart home option for added convenience.  Building features roof top deck with grills, business center, coffee station, fiber optic internet, secured package room, free bike storage, sprinkler system, and more!  Garage parking available for additional $200 per month.  Cat and dog friendly with dog washing station and dog run.  Contact us for a showing today!Live in the heart of Lincoln Square/Ravenswood.  A converted warehouse with added stories of brand new construction make 2150 W Lawrence a unique living experience in a prime location.High ceilings, fully enclosed bedrooms, sun filled apartments, and massive size windows are just some of what makes this property so special. With all of the bells and whistles, the apartments at 2150 W Lawrence also feature modern finishes and a smart-home option!  Kitchens with stainless steel appliances, quartz counter tops, microwaves, dishwashers, two-tone cabinetry, and islands/breakfast bars in some floor plans. Modern baths feature subway tile, floating vanities with storage, rain shower heads, and Bluetooth speaker system. 10+ foot ceilings, ample closet space, and hard surface flooring throughout. Multiple floor plans - some with private balconies! This amenity building boasts a spacious rooftop sundeck with grills and unobstructed views of downtown Chicago.  Business center, secured package room, fiber internet, coffee station, intercom to cell phone, and more. Attached garage spaces available for additional and plenty of street parking. Pet friendly!  Dog washing station and dog run on site. With a 96 "WalkScore", this address boarders two of Chicago's hottest North side neighborhoods!  Take a stroll through Lincoln Square and enjoy restaurants, shops, fitness options, and movies at the Davis theater.  Check out the Lincoln Square farmer's market with live music!  Ravenswood restaurants, coffee shops, and activities - also just 2 blocks away on Damen Ave.  Mariano's grocery a short walk down Lawrence Ave. Winnemac Park with walking trails just 2 blocks to the North. Take in a Cubs game or day in the sun - just a 10 minute drive to Wrigleyville or Montrose beach (and dog beach)!  24-hour Lawrence bus stops right in front of the building.  Just an 8 minute walk to both the Damen and Western CTA Brown Line train stations. Get downtown in 16 minutes on the Ravenswood Metra or head to Ravinia and other North shore hot spots - a 10 minute walk to the Metra station!An amazing new addition to this historic neighborhood.  2150 W Lawrence has your every comfort and convenience at heart.Rooms and Interior. Featuring 1 bedrooms for rent, 2 bedrooms for rent and 3 bedrooms for rent 80th &  Lafayette in West Chatham has many great apartments. Each of these Chicago apartments is individually heated, so you can set the temperatures to what you want and the apartments have central air as well. The apartments at 80th &  Lafayette have new appliances as well and don't forget to bring your pets because this West Chatham apartment building is cat friendly!

This West Chatham apartment for rent building is the commuters dream since it is located very close to both the Red Line and the expressway -- you'll be able to zip around the city with ease from this location. Nearby West Chatham Park has a spray pool, baseball diamonds, playground, basketball courts and tennis courts available for use. They also run a number of season sporting events and after school programs throughout the year.

There's free radiator heat, , a security system in each unit, appliances, carpeting, lake front deck area & on-site laundry facility. Assigned parking can be available for additional fee/mo.

The apartments at 7425 S Shore Dr located in Chicago's South Shore Community have many great offerings.  There are studios for rent, 1 bedrooms for rent and 2 bedrooms for rent is this great high-rise rental building. There are several different floor plans and many have spectacular views of Lake Michigan.  All these Chicago apartments have free heat and hot water, leaving the resident responsible for electric and cooking gas.  The apartments in this apartment building have hardwood floors.

7425 S Shore Dr is located next to the lakeshore and even has its own private beach for residents to use. There is also an intercom entry system and laundry facilities in the building.  7425 S Shore Dr also have parking options for residents.

Text2: Window Coverings, Dishwasher, Dog Park, New BBQ Area ,Sizable Bedrooms
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome to life at Reserve at Eagle Ridge Apartment Homes! Our community offers spacious and affordable studio, one and two-bedroom apartments for rent in Waukegan, that are perfectly priced for any budget while also providing a level of luxury that is unmatched in the area. When you tour one of our many floor plans, you will notice that we have designed our apartments with your comfort in mind. Enjoy a private patio/balcony, walk-in closets, select units with washer and dryer and other great amenities. Not only will the inside of our apartments provide you with comfort and convenience, but our community features will as well. Relax out by the swimming pool or soak up the sun on our spacious sundeck. Our fully-equipped fitness center is available to all residents, so you can save time and money on a gym membership. Reserve at Eagle Ridge is proud to welcome your furry friends into our community by offering pet-friendly apartments and a private Dog Park to Waukegan residents. Our residents enjoy living minutes from Lake Michigan and the Great Lakes Naval Base. We are also conveniently located near major employers including Abbott Labs and Medline with easy access to major highways US 41 and I-94. Schedule a tour of our apartments today and see why our residents love living here!

Text2: Free Starbucks Every Morning!!!!!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Let me tell you a little bit about Lux 96! We are a newer construction located on 96th and W 6th street in the heart of Papillion. With spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes and high-end finishes you will finally feel like you are home! Every apartment comes with a full size washer and dryer, ample storage with walk in closets, as well as all major stainless steel kitchen appliances such as a refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, and microwave. All kitchens come with beautiful granite counter tops. We have plank wood flooring and carpet throughout the apartments along with a beautiful tile in the bathrooms. Every apartment has high ceiling as well as huge windows to let in natural lighting. All apartments are cable ready and come equipped with Cox high speed internet that is only $40 for 150 megs! Every apartment will have a pre-installed router. We also provide Cox homelife for just $11 a month. With Cox homelife you get an indoor HD camera, a smartlife hub/ tablet, 2 door chimes, 1 smart light bulb, and a pre-installed smart thermostat. All yours to keep at move-out apart from the thermostat.

Text2: Beautiful Bungelow Within Walking Distance to Queeny Park
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1203 Miremont Dr. Ballwin, MO 63011  show contact info


Enjoy all of the benefits of the excellent location that this 4 Bedroom, 1 ½ bath, 1400 sq ft home has to offer. Charming bungalow with style. About 200 sq feet in finished basement for storage. Wonderful, very safe neighborhood with highly rated schools, close to everything including Costco, Home Depot, and shopping. Rent is $2150/mo, with one month’s deposit. A medium sized dog is permitted, with a $250 pet deposit, and $25/mo pet fee. We take care of sewer. Utilities and lawn maintenance are tenant’s responsibility. We are looking for a 1 year lease or better.

This home has just been completely re-done. Professionally repainted throughout, new roof, new tiling in kitchen and upstairs bath, including bathtub surround. Hardwood and tile flooring throughout, with carpet in bedrooms. Brand new washer and dryer also included. Refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and oven are also included.

Lower level has enormous master suite (4th bedroom), including two large closets that span the length of the room. Or use it as a large recreation area, complete with cable set up, windows, bathroom and walkout access to a large, green and quiet backyard. Off-street asphalt driveway and asphalt pad will accommodate parking for up to 4 cars.

This home is not for sale, no broker, property management, or real estate company assistance is needed. We must speak with the actual tenant who will be residing in the property. Meeting in person is a must during daylight hours. Please contact Susan or Rick at via CALL to set up an appointment to see this beautiful property. Contact me via e-mail for a rental application. An open house with rental applications will be held soon. This property won’t last, priority will be given to early applicants.

Credit check of 650+, criminal background check in Missouri/Illinois, and employment verification will all be performed. A non-refundable fee of $45 will be assessed for background checks.

With beautiful grounds, expansive layouts and convenient amenities and features, River’s Edge gives you plenty of reasons to breathe easy!
